item.title: 英美资源集团因澳大利亚煤价下跌而裁员
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）正在削减澳大利亚一些炼焦煤矿的工作岗位，以保障其长期可持续发展，同时表示生产不会受到影响。【原文：Anglo American Plc is cutting jobs at some Australian coking coal mines to safeguard its long-term sustainability, while saying that production would remain unaffected.】

item.title: 发生致命骚乱后，普拉博沃将矛头指向印尼大亨
item.description:
这位前将军将目标对准了亿万富翁，排挤政治对手，并在重塑印尼经济的过程中对中央银行施加压力

。【原文：

The former general is targeting billionaires, sidelining political rivals and adding pressure on the central bank in his bid to reshape Indonesia’s economy

】

item.title: 铁矿石下滑，原因是中国消费放缓，影响了需求
item.description: 铁矿石连续第二天走低，原因是在最新数据显示政府支出放缓后，投资者对中国的需求进行了权衡。【原文：Iron ore edged lower for a second day as investors weighed Chinese demand after the latest data showed a slowdown in government spending.】

item.title: 美联储降息或将提振情绪，基金经理热捧印度股市
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 美世称，特朗普导致资金撤离美国资产
item.description: 据美世有限责任公司（Mercer LLC）称，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）为重构全球贸易和迫使美联储降息所做的努力，正促使投资者削减其在美国的投资。【原文：Donald Trump’s efforts to rewire global trade and pressure the Federal Reserve into cutting interest rates are prompting investors to trim their US exposure, according to Mercer LLC.】

item.title: 澳大利亚就业市场紧俏促使澳大利亚央行采取谨慎立场
item.description: 澳大利亚失业率在上个月保持稳定，即使在经济下滑、求职人数减少的情况下也是如此，这表明劳动力市场依然紧张，并强化了储备银行对宽松政策的谨慎态度。【原文：Australian unemployment held steady last month even as the economy shed jobs with fewer people looking for work, signaling the labor market remains tight and reinforcing the Reserve Bank’s cautious approach to policy easing.】

item.title: 锌市场双速增长意味着中国可能获得出口机会
item.description: 在全球锌价创下今年年初以来的最高点之后，中国锌生产商和贸易商正在寻找机会将金属运往海外，尽管国内市场举步维艰。【原文：Chinese zinc producers and traders are watching for opportunities to ship metal overseas, after global prices hit the highest since the start of the year even as the domestic market struggles.】

item.title: 美联储评论引发谨慎情绪，黄金止跌创新高
item.description: 在美联储宣布降息后，黄金从上一交易日创下的新纪录下滑，但仍保持跌势。【原文：Gold held a decline, after it slipped from a fresh record in the previous session following the Federal Reserve’s much-anticipated announcement to cut interest rates.】

item.title: Meta 推出售价 799 美元的带屏幕眼镜，争夺主流市场
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司希望将其蓬勃发展的智能眼镜打造成必备产品，并于周三推出了第一款内置屏幕的智能眼镜。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc., seeking to turn its burgeoning smart glasses into a must-have product, on Wednesday unveiled its first version with a built-in screen.】

item.title: 企业发行给马来西亚主权债券带来阻力
item.description: 马来西亚的主权债券正面临着季节性大量企业债发行所带来的新一轮冲击，而降息押注的消退也给市场带来了压力。【原文：Malaysia’s sovereign bonds are facing fresh headwinds from seasonally heavy corporate debt issuance, just as fading rate cut bets strain the market.】

item.title: 税务公司安达信最快本周公开申请 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由已关闭的安达信会计师事务所的校友创建的安达信集团公司正计划最快于本周公开申请首次公开募股。【原文：Andersen Group Inc., founded by alumni of shuttered accounting firm Arthur Andersen, is planning to publicly file for its IPO as soon as this week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本央行将维持利率不变，重点关注 10 月信号
item.description: 人们普遍预计日本央行将在周五的政策会议上维持基准利率不变，这使得日本央行的观察家们需要寻找下个月或 12 月可能采取利率行动的线索。【原文：The Bank of Japan is widely expected to keep its benchmark interest rate unchanged at a policy meeting Friday, leaving BOJ watchers to sift for clues as to the likelihood of a move next month or in December.】

item.title: 分析师称美联储提振美元将拖累亚洲货币
item.description: 分析师称，美联储仅将利率下调四分之一个百分点的决定将有助于支撑美元，并对整个亚洲的货币构成压力。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s decision to cut interest rates by just a quarter point will help support the dollar and weigh on currencies across Asia, analysts say.】

item.title: Veritas 支持的 Anthology 考虑通过破产进行债权人收购
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，Anthology 公司正在为可能的破产保护奠定基础，一些有担保的贷款人将控制这家陷入困境的教育软件提供商。【原文：Anthology Inc. is laying the groundwork for a potential Chapter 11 bankruptcy that would see some secured lenders take control of the troubled education-software provider, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 经济和政治风险加剧，鲍威尔拉拢美联储同事
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）说服了分歧严重的决策者委员会支持降息，顶住了沉重的政治压力，在因劳动力市场不景气和通胀担忧挥之不去而忧心忡忡的官员中找到了中间立场。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell rallied a deeply divided committee of policymakers behind an interest rate-cut, tuning out heavy political pressure to find middle ground among officials variously worried by a faltering labor market and lingering inflation concerns.】

item.title: 越南初创企业寻求在第三大电动摩托车市场分一杯羹
item.description: 越南电动摩托车制造商 Dat Bike 获得了 2200 万美元的新融资，将在全球增长最快的两轮电动车市场上与本田汽车公司和雅马哈公司等老牌企业一较高下。【原文：Vietnamese electric motorbike maker Dat Bike secured $22 million in fresh funding as it takes on established players such as Honda Motor Co. and Yamaha Corp. in one of the world’s fastest-growing two-wheel EV markets.】

item.title: 英国希望实现社会流动，但私立学校仍占主导地位
item.description: 根据一份有关英国社会流动性的详尽新报告，尽管企业越来越努力从更多样化的背景中招聘人才，但私立学校的校友们仍然在英国社会最有权势的职位中占据主导地位。【原文：Despite increasing corporate efforts to hire from more diverse backgrounds, private school alumni remain dominant among the most powerful positions in British society, according to a sprawling new report on social mobility in the United Kingdom.】

item.title: 英国央行吉尔债券计划将在利率投票中大放异彩
item.description: 英国央行将控制其量化紧缩计划，因为人们担心其金边债券销售会加剧债券市场的波动。【原文：The Bank of England is set to rein in its quantitative tightening program amid concerns that its gilt sales are worsening volatility in the bond market.】

item.title: 爱尔兰中央银行称，尽管贸易动荡，爱尔兰经济仍有活力
item.description: 爱尔兰中央银行（Central Bank of Ireland）表示，尽管受到全球贸易动荡的影响，但爱尔兰经济已初步显示出韧性。【原文：The Irish economy has shown early signs of resilience despite exposure to global trade turmoil, the Central Bank of Ireland said.】

item.title: 网络安全公司 Netskope 据称将以每股 19 美元的价格进行 IPO
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，光速创投（Lightspeed Venture Partners）支持的网络安全公司 Netskope Inc.【原文：Netskope Inc., the cybersecurity firm backed by Lightspeed Venture Partners, priced its US initial public offering at $19 per share, the top of the marketed range, according to a person familiar with the matter, who asked not to be identified as the information isn’t public.】

item.title: Mercado Pago 收购巴西公司以扩展投资产品
item.description: MercadoLibre 的金融服务部门 Mercado Pago 已同意收购巴西证券分销商 Nikos DTVM，此举将扩大其在拉丁美洲最大经济体的投资产品供应。【原文：Mercado Pago, the financial services arm of MercadoLibre, has agreed to acquire Brazilian securities distributor Nikos DTVM, a move that will expand its offerings of investment products in Latin America’s largest economy.】

item.title: 美联储今年首次降息，美国股指期货上涨：市场综述
item.description: 美国股票指数期货在亚洲早盘交易中走高，这表明美联储降息后风险情绪重新升温。【原文：US equity-index futures advanced in early Asian trading, in a sign of renewed risk sentiment following the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 贝宝与谷歌建立合作关系，实现人工智能主导的商务
item.description: 贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. and Alphabet Inc.’s Google have forged an online-shopping partnership that will combine their respective payments and artificial intelligence tools for transactions.】

item.title: 新西兰第二季度经济萎缩超过预期
item.description: 由于失业率上升和全球不确定性抑制了需求，新西兰第二季度的经济萎缩程度远远超过了经济学家的预测。【原文：New Zealand’s economy shrank much more than economists forecast in the second quarter as rising unemployment and global uncertainty curbed demand.】

item.title: Vervent 将接管 Tricolor 的汽车贷款服务
item.description: 据一份法院文件显示，在总部位于达拉斯的次级贷款公司 Tricolor Holdings 上周申请破产清算后，Vervent Inc. 将接管 Tricolor Holdings 的消费汽车贷款组合服务，但尚待法院批准。【原文：Vervent Inc. is set to take over servicing Tricolor Holdings’ portfolio of consumer car loans after the Dallas-based subprime lender filed to liquidate through bankruptcy last week, pending court approval, according to a court filing.】

item.title: 中资银行在市场触顶之际加码 10 万亿美元债券赌注
item.description: 就在中国债券的长期牛市渐行渐远之际，中国的银行却以 2019 年以来最快的速度大量举借国债。【原文：Just as China’s long bull run for bonds is fading, the nation’s banks have loaded up on government debt at the fastest pace since 2019.】

item.title: 二手车独角兽瘦身，通过印度 IPO 筹集 10 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度一些最大的二手车在线销售商正在缩减成本，退出二级市场，为潜在的股票上市做准备，这些公司可能会筹集到超过 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Some of India’s biggest online vendors of used cars are trimming costs and quitting secondary ventures to prepare for potential stock listings that could raise more than $1 billion combined, according to people familiar with the development.】

item.title: 人民币汇率逼近可能促使出口商抛售美元的水平
item.description: 分析师说，中国的人民币汇率正接近关键水平，这可能会刺激更多的本地公司转换其持有的美元。【原文：China’s yuan is nearing key levels that may spur more local companies to convert their dollar holdings, analysts said.】

item.title: 降息引发科技股震荡，转投低价股
item.description: 周三，在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）将新出现的劳动力市场疲软与通胀率居高不下的 "不寻常 "情况描述为 "不寻常 "的情况下，美联储宣布了人们普遍预期的降息，华尔街在高飞的科技股上获利了结，转而进入市场中更便宜的角落。【原文：Wall Street took profits in high flying technology stocks on Wednesday, rotating into cheaper corners of the market after the Federal Reserve delivered a widely expected interest rate cut under what Chair Jerome Powell described as an “unusual” situation of emerging labor-market weakness while inflation remains elevated.】

item.title: 帕兰提尔在特朗普访英之际扩大英国防务交易和投资
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Palantir 科技公司正在加强与英国的联系，承诺在英国投资 15 亿英镑，同时赢得英国国防部的一项协议，扩大其人工智能软件的使用范围。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. is strengthening its UK ties, pledging to invest £1.5 billion in the country while winning a deal with the UK Ministry of Defence to expand the use of its AI software, according to a person familiar with the matter.】
